requirements.text: Apply a blue background theme across the application so the overall page background is visibly blue while keeping text readable and maintaining consistent styling for cards, borders, and interactive elements.
acceptanceCriteria: The app background is clearly blue on the main pages (application form, my applications, application detail).
Text and form controls remain accessible/legible with sufficient contrast against the new blue background.
No layout regressions: header, main content, and footer still render with proper spacing and separation.

requirements.text: Add a logo in the header using a generated static image selected by the system (since the user did not provide a logo), and display it next to the "MD SUHEL" site name.

acceptanceCriteria: A logo image is rendered in the header adjacent to the "MD SUHEL" brand text.
The logo is loaded from a static asset path under frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).
The logo maintains good alignment and sizing on both mobile and desktop header layouts.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify immutable frontend hook paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep backend unchanged; branding/theme/logo changes are frontend-only.
nonGoals: Do not add new pages or change application form fields/validation.
Do not implement uploading a custom user-provided logo (use a system-selected generated logo only).
Do not change authentication behavior (Internet Identity sign-in/out flow stays as-is).

required: Minimal modern monogram logo with the letters "MS" in a blue-and-white palette, flat vector style, transparent background (md-suhel-logo.dim_256x256.png)
